pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/timedelta.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/timedelta/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install timedelta```#### Examples```python>>> import timedelta>>> td = timedelta.Timedelta(days=2, hours=2)# init from datetime.timedelta>>> td = timedelta.Timedelta(datetime1 - datetime2)````total` seconds, minutes, hours, days```python>>> td = timedelta.Timedelta(days=2, hours=2)>>> td.total.seconds180000>>> td.total.minutes3000>>> td.total.hours50>>> td.total.days2```#### Links+ [timedelta Objects](https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#timedelta-objects)

readme42.com
